entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clearing. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
